job_tasks.phrase: Automating Salesforce and CPQ Configurations: Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of solutions to automate specific business processes (Salesforce and CPQ configurations), which falls under building and integrating software features.

job_tasks.phrase: CPQ Optimization: Configure and automate CPQ workflows to improve quoting accuracy and speed
job_tasks.justification: This involves configuring and automating workflows within a specific system (CPQ), indicating software development to improve efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: CI/CD Pipeline Management: Implement and maintain automated deployment processes for Salesforce updates
job_tasks.justification: This clearly refers to implementing and maintaining automated deployment processes, which is a core aspect of CI/CD and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure all systems are aligned with performance, security, and scalability requirements
job_tasks.justification: This phrase relates to the non-functional requirements of software systems, which are part of the software development lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: By leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on automating existing business processes (Salesforce, CPQ) and CI/CD pipeline management for these systems, rather than developing or fine-tuning AI models. There is no mention of LLMs, generative models, or core AI/ML tasks like algorithm development.
